name: Cube Jump (Alexx_Antonn)
description:
Cube Jump is a 2D game where you have to jump over platforms. You can hit the edges of the platforms and you will rotate in the air. 

If you are stuck in a platform you can restart the level.

There is only 1 level available.

Controls:

Left Click - Jump

Esc - Pause Menu

Game made in 3 days!
